audit_metadata.auditor_role: Senior UX + Accessibility + Compliance + Security + DX Reviewer

overall_readiness.rationale: Platform shows strong foundation but requires security hardening and accessibility improvements before production deployment

findings.issue: Missing evaluator identity fields in employer_evaluations table per Â§1910.178(l)(6)
findings.description: Current schema lacks evaluator_title and evaluator_certification which are required for compliance documentation

findings.issue: Records page shows evaluator name but missing formal evaluation documentation link
findings.description: OSHA requires accessible practical evaluation records

findings.issue: Verification page provides minimal learner identification
findings.description: Consider adding training date for better compliance tracking

findings.issue: Quiz modal buttons lack proper focus trapping and aria-live announcements
findings.description: Choice buttons missing keyboard navigation and screen reader support

fix.code:
- className="block w-full rounded border p-3 text-left hover:bg-gray-50 hover:border-orange-600 transition"
+ className="block w-full rounded border p-3 text-left hover:bg-gray-50 hover:border-orange-600 transition focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#F76511]"
+ aria-describedby="quiz-instructions"

findings.issue: Interactive games lack sufficient keyboard navigation
findings.description: Tap handlers present but incomplete keyboard equivalents

findings.issue: Orange brand color (#F76511) has insufficient contrast ratio
findings.description: Minimum 4.5:1 required for AA compliance on white backgrounds

fix.code: Use darker orange variant #D35400 for text on light backgrounds

findings.issue: Missing aria-live regions for dynamic feedback in games
findings.description: HotspotsEight has aria-live but many other games don't

findings.issue: Focus rings inconsistently applied across interactive elements
findings.description: DemoPanel has proper focus states but Quiz components need updates

findings.issue: Service role key exposed on client-side in multiple API routes
findings.description: Service role key conditionally used but several lookup routes directly expose it

fix.code:
+ export const runtime = "nodejs";
+ export const dynamic = "force-dynamic";

findings.issue: Admin export endpoint lacks rate limiting
findings.description: Only checks token but no IP/request limiting

fix.code:
+ const ip = req.headers.get('x-forwarded-for')?.split(',')[0] || 'unknown';
+ // Add rate limiting logic similar to svc/submit/route.ts:24-39

findings.issue: PII exposure in admin CSV exports
findings.description: Route returns learner IDs directly without proper anonymization

findings.issue: Missing CSP headers for API routes
findings.description: Consider adding Content-Security-Policy for XSS protection

findings.issue: Missing RLS policy for verification API
findings.description: Uses service role without restrictions, potentially exposing all certificate data

fix.code:
create policy verify_public_access on public.certificates
for select to anon, authenticated using (true);

findings.issue: eval_submissions table allows unrestricted INSERT
findings.description: Permits any anonymous creation without validation

findings.issue: Certificates table RLS correctly implemented
findings.description: Learner-only access and service role permissions properly configured

findings.issue: Missing input validation in progress API
findings.description: Lacks Zod schema validation for autosave data

fix.code:
+ const ProgressSchema = z.object({
+   enrollmentId: z.string().uuid(),
+   itemId: z.string().min(1),
+   correct: z.boolean(),
+   choice: z.union([z.number(), z.string()]),
+   ts: z.number()
+ });

findings.issue: Certificate PDF generation missing error boundaries
findings.description: Could fail silently on PDF generation errors

findings.issue: Employer evaluations API doesn't validate enrollment ownership
findings.description: Should verify user owns enrollment before inserting evaluation

findings.issue: Most APIs have proper Zod validation and error responses
findings.description: Good pattern consistency across endpoints

findings.issue: DemoPanel Continue button triggers completion without user interaction validation
findings.description: Should require actual demo engagement

fix.code:
+ const [hasInteracted, setHasInteracted] = useState(false);
+ // Pass setHasInteracted to children and disable Continue until interaction

findings.issue: Quiz review-incorrect gating works but lacks clear progress indication
findings.description: Users may not understand they must review before retaking

findings.issue: HotspotsEight provides good visual feedback
findings.description: Checkmarks and progress counter work well

findings.issue: Consistency across games is good
findings.description: Proper completion callbacks and state management

findings.issue: Missing critical learning analytics events
findings.description: No tracking for lesson_start/complete, sim_param_change, certificate_issued/downloaded, employer_eval_saved

fix.code:
+ analytics.track("lesson_start", { moduleId, userId });
+ analytics.track("certificate_issued", { certificateId, score });

findings.issue: Analytics implementation is minimal console.debug
findings.description: Production needs real analytics service integration

findings.description: demo_start/demo_complete and quiz_item_answered events present
